reviews.review_msg: EDUC370 was so enjoyable because of him. He was very understanding, caring, and engaging. I would recommend this class with him.

A true gem of a professor. I can't believe he's not given more classes to teach. simply incredible, passionate, very knowledgeable and caring. Don't miss out and take his class if you ever get the chance.

He is incredibly kind and caring towards his students, truly embodying the material he teaches! He is very willing to take time out of his day to discuss material and help students. Definitely recommend!!!
such a great professor! caring, respectful, accessible, etc. the course content is super interesting too! i love the way he evaluates and assesses your work. take this course if u can!!!

Dale is the most down-to-earth prof. Not only because he always try his best to include everyone (not just saying hi to class but actually say our names!!!!! We had about 25 people in our class and Dale will say hi like 25 times with our name:) How could you not love him?) very approachable and able to simplify complicated concepts!

Dale wants his students to thrive, and he'll do anything to make that happen. He cares about us and understands that we have other aspects of our lives than school. He is accommodating with due dates and the way the course is formatted. He can occasionally ramble during lectures, but what he has to say is important. He is devoted!

Dale was a great instructor to have and made it very obvious that he cares about his students and their academic careers. He always makes sure that everyone is comfortable and doing ok with the workload given. Dale also gives valuable feedback on papers that will be a great help in future papers.

Dale is a amazing professor you can tell that he really loves his job and cares about his students. You can tell he is very passionate about the course and made it interesting. The class wasnt very hard but he always checked in and asked if the work load was too much. I wish all my profs were like Dale.

I have to preface this by stating that this wasn't an entirely academic class, and was fully online. It is so apparent that he cares deeply for his students. He's incredibly approachable, and gives insightful feedback. Above all, he is incredibly engaging with his lectures. I wish I could have him for all my courses
You just need to finish the weekly discussions, write an essay (easy topic) and see him in office hour twice. Then, an easy A.
Best instructor

Dale is one of the best instructors I've had. He is extremely passionate about what he teaches, and is the most supportive, fair human ever. He talks a lot, but what he has to say is insightful and thought-provoking. He cares so much about his subject and his students. 100% would take any class offered with him!!

Dale is an excellent professor who cares about his students and the material that he is teaching. Would 100% take his class again as he made learning the material enjoyable. Very nice person and a fun professor.

Dale is one of the best professors ever! He is hilarious and makes even the most serious of topics interesting. He was always accessible after class to answer any questions or to discuss deadlines and was very flexible! He picks really interesting articles that are discussed in class along with group presentations on the articles every other week

knowledgeable instructor who understands situation of students very well, so he never wants something from you more than enough, he's super flexible and then that makes you feel love the course as well. such a great experience with him definitely the best instructor ever
Best professor in FIC overall, he is inspiring, this course has lots of work to do, but he is always open to help you out through it. Gives reasonable grade with good feedbacks.
The best professor I met here, who is easy going and give well feedback, even I'm not good at English I can still enjoy the class.
Best Professor!

Dale is a cool instructor when it comes to teaching history. He is a knowledgeable, a down-to-earth instructor during his class, and beard cool dude after class. As a first-year international student studying foreign history, I encountered many language/cultural barriers along the way, Dale was always there to help.

Dale is a great prof! Do to class dynamics, it was difficult to spark major discussion at time. Nevertheless, Dale tried his best to engage students in the subject. The topics and readings he chose were really interesting, highly recommend this class if you're the least bit interested in the course content.

Dale is great. He is knowledgeable about the subject, and class discussions are inspirational. Generous and fair marker, however, due to the nature of the course, a lot of reading is required, but that's the package for sociology or labour studies courses, can't blame him for that. I would definitely take him again to explore the subject.

Before Writing his term papers have Office hour with him. Try to find out how he wants the term paper to be presented. Follow his instruction and write the paper it is going to be straight (A). Asks for help to chose the article of your term paper. He is free to give a brief summary of the articles.

Dale is an incredible lecturer and a caring soul. His passion for the labour studies subject matter is evident in lecture and tutorial. I learned a lot in his class. One can do well in his course by paying attention to his clear grading rubric and his instructions. I appreciated how he facilitated great discussions in class.

Dale is one of the most amazing and professional instructors that I have ever seen in my entire life. He is very reasonable with the deadlines and if you are an international student from another country, he will insist on trying to pronounce your original name in order to make you feel comfortable. Definitely 5/5
Dale is awesome. Highly recommended Prof

If you are not socialist do not take this class. The class is essentially left wing propaganda. If your not socialist and been working your whole life the discussions will drive you nuts.  A lot of improper statistics and devaluing of hard work.  Dale is a solid enough dude and teacher but the class is flawed on the whole.

He is one of the most passionate,knowledgeable and fair prof in LBST. You need to be actively participating in class but he makes the dry material as relevant&interesting as possible. He is the best lbst prof at sfu. Grading is most fair.He wont judge,play favorites like other profs in LBST. Many lbst profs are unfair bc they lack real experience.
Awesome prof!! Very passionate about the material he is teaching.  I would take a course with him just to experience a very well-taught and engaging class.  Recommend X 100!!
Dale is great, he makes history interesting and I want to take his class again ! I love him.
Select his class, you'll never regret
He is such a good teacher, very helpful and knowledge, you can talk to him about anything, and he remembers you. His teaching is clear and easy to follow

I'd be a hypocrite if i didn't write for Dale, as you can see, yes he is probably the best, im looking forward to taking more courses with him in the future, he is very kind and nice and if you're remotely interested in history then dale is your man, he shows you things in a wonderful perspective! and he is always available for help, anytime

Awesome prof!! One of THE BEST I've had at sfu! Extremely helpful, super knowledgable and pretty funny which makes lectures entertaining. If the class looks interesting to you at all, take it!! If you don't do the reading class discussions are pretty quiet, do it even if you don't understand it, ask questions in class he will definitely explain

He is a REALLY nice person. He writes everything on the board and makes funny comments now and then. He knows a lot, and is very helpful. People should respect him more, many take advantage of his kindness.
AWESOME PROF EVER! I took two classes with and he's my favourite. Helpful, funny, engaging...!
ah!! He is my favorite professor. He is so cool and funny.. Class is so interactive and entertaining.
Best teacher ever! very helpful and friendly!!
Lectures can be entertaining, seminar/interaction portion is bs, assignments have very loose guidelines (kind of lazy on prof's part),class is alright - nothing special
best teacher ever!
Great prof!!! Although it was not the easiest course I have taken, it is very interesting. Dale is always willing to meet with you outside of class to help you succeed.
He is coollllll. his lectures are always interesting, he is very helpful. GREAT PROF...

My biggest problem with Dale was how his participation system was set up (he tallies each comment you make). I spent hours keeping up with the readings each week, which ended up being useless as class discussions were always hijacked by people BSing about unrelated topics. In the end, my participation mark (worth 20%) suffered because I couldn't BS
Dale is the kindest and nicest instructor I've ever seen.Accessibly helpful as long as he can.He tries his best to help students. Replies emails super fast.Great prof!
One of the best profs ever!
chill guy

Dale is the nicest guy. I didn't think I was doing that well in the class and yet got an A overall! Participation is mandatory and is worth 25% of your grade -- so if you don't like talking about labour issues don't take the class. Warning: You may leave this class a socialist! =)
